projects.name: Drowsiness Detection and Location sharing using Python
projects.description: A system designed to monitor driver fatigue, triggering an alert upon detection and simultaneously sharing their location for safety measures.

projects.name: Hotel Management website
projects.description: A digital platform facilitating hotel operations, from room bookings to guest services, enhancing the overall customer experience.

projects.name: Fake Image Detection using Steganography
projects.description: This Application collects the meta data of the image then encrypts it using the users private key and uses steganography techniques to embedded it in the meta data of the image.

projects.name: Climate Information with Carbon footprint
projects.description: This mobile application is designed to provide users with climate information and tools to monitor and reduce their carbon footprint. It includes features such as climate news, weather updates, and a carbon footprint calculator.

experiences.description: I worked on website design, delved into the basics of the Facial Recognition System (FRS), created documentation, including PowerPoint presentations, and contributed as the front-end developer for drone control applications during my tenure at this company.
